title: ShootOut
body:
<<thinkingFont Dialogue>>
That looks like Rachael by the dumpster.
Seems like she is trying to get rid of the evidence.
<<endThinkingFont Dialogue>>
[[Hide quietly and observe|ShootOut.Observe]]
[[Call out for her to stop|ShootOut.CallOut]]
[[Draw your gun|ShootOut.Draw]]

title: ShootOut.Observe
body:
<<thinkingFont Dialogue>>
She is putting something in the dumpster.
Looks like a rifle, poorly disguised in a bag.
<<endThinkingFont Dialogue>>
[[Sneak up to apprehend her|ShootOut.Sneak]]
[[Draw your weapon and announce yourself|ShootOut.Announce]]

title: ShootOut.Sneak
body: Rachael: You should pick a better hiding spot next time Detective.
